languages.text: {n}...и, не выдержав подобного вторжения, вы отдергиваете руку. Маражай хмыкает, небрежно проводит двумя пальцами по кристаллу, после чего возвращает его на положенное место на поясе.{/n}
{n}...and, unable to endure the onslaught, you draw your hand back. Marazhai scoffs, blithely drags two fingers across the crystal, and returns it to its proper place on his belt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...и, не выдержав подобного вторжения, вы отдергиваете руку. Маражай хмыкает, небрежно проводит двумя пальцами по кристаллу, после чего возвращает его на положенное место на поясе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}...and, unable to endure the onslaught, you draw your hand back. Marazhai scoffs, blithely drags two fingers across the crystal, and returns it to its proper place on his belt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}...and, unable to endure the onslaught, you draw your hand back. Marazhai scoffs, blithely drags two fingers across the crystal, and returns it to its proper place on his belt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}...and, unable to endure the onslaught, you draw your hand back. Marazhai scoffs, blithely drags two fingers across the crystal, and returns it to its proper place on his belt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}……你无法忍受水晶的冲击，将手抽了回来。玛拉斋哼了一声，轻描淡写地用两根手指勾住了水晶，将它放回腰带上原本的位置。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and, unable to endure the onslaught, you draw your hand back. Marazhai scoffs, blithely drags two fingers across the crystal, and returns it to its proper place on his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}……你无法忍受水晶的冲击，将手抽了回来。玛拉斋哼了一声，轻描淡写地用两根手指勾住了水晶，将它放回腰带上原本的位置。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}…その激しさに耐えきれずに手を引っ込める。マラズハイはククッと笑って、平気そうに2本の指でクリスタルを掴むと、ベルトの定位置に戻した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and, unable to endure the onslaught, you draw your hand back. Marazhai scoffs, blithely drags two fingers across the crystal, and returns it to its proper place on his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}…その激しさに耐えきれずに手を引っ込める。マラズハイはククッと笑って、平気そうに2本の指でクリスタルを掴むと、ベルトの定位置に戻した。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}... incapaz de soportar el asalto, apartas la mano. Marazhai se burla, acaricia con dos dedos el cristal y lo devuelve a su sitio en su cinturón.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and, unable to endure the onslaught, you draw your hand back. Marazhai scoffs, blithely drags two fingers across the crystal, and returns it to its proper place on his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... incapaz de soportar el asalto, apartas la mano. Marazhai se burla, acaricia con dos dedos el cristal y lo devuelve a su sitio en su cinturón.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Incapable de résister à cet assaut des sens, vous retirez votre main à la hâte. Marazhai ricane, puis il effleure du bout des doigts la surface du cristal comme si de rien n'était et le remet en place sur sa ceinture.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and, unable to endure the onslaught, you draw your hand back. Marazhai scoffs, blithely drags two fingers across the crystal, and returns it to its proper place on his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Incapable de résister à cet assaut des sens, vous retirez votre main à la hâte. Marazhai ricane, puis il effleure du bout des doigts la surface du cristal comme si de rien n'était et le remet en place sur sa ceinture.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}... du erträgst allerdings nicht diese geballte Negativität und ziehst deine Hand zurück. Marazhai verzieht grimmig das Gesicht und streicht dann unbekümmert mit zwei Fingern über den Kristall. Dann bringt er ihn wieder an seinem Gürtel an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and, unable to endure the onslaught, you draw your hand back. Marazhai scoffs, blithely drags two fingers across the crystal, and returns it to its proper place on his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}... du erträgst allerdings nicht diese geballte Negativität und ziehst deine Hand zurück. Marazhai verzieht grimmig das Gesicht und streicht dann unbekümmert mit zwei Fingern über den Kristall. Dann bringt er ihn wieder an seinem Gürtel an.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Böylesine şiddetli bir hücuma dayanamayarak elini geri çekiyorsun. Marazhai, gülerek iki parmağını kaygısızca kristalin üzerinde gezdiriyor ve ardından onu kemerindeki yerine geri koyuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}...and, unable to endure the onslaught, you draw your hand back. Marazhai scoffs, blithely drags two fingers across the crystal, and returns it to its proper place on his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Böylesine şiddetli bir hücuma dayanamayarak elini geri çekiyorsun. Marazhai gülerek iki parmağını kaygısızca kristalin üzerinde gezdiriyor ve ardından onu kemerindeki yerine geri koyuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
